imf.data 0.1.0

  • Changelog

Calls API endpoint 'DataStructure'

Source: R/methods.R
mt_data_structure.Rd

Calls API endpoint 'DataStructure'

Usage

mt_data_structure(id)

Arguments

id

is a Dataset Series identifier.

Value

a list with content of 'DataStructure' response.

Examples

mt_data_structure("DOT")
#> $Structure
#> $Structure$`@xmlns:xsd`
#> [1] "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
#> 
#> $Structure$`@xmlns:xsi`
#> [1] "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
#> 
#> $Structure$`@xmlns`
#> [1] "http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/message"
#> 
#> $Structure$`@xsi:schemaLocation`
#> [1] "http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/structure https://registry.sdmx.org/schemas/v2_0/SDMXStructure.xsd http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/message https://registry.sdmx.org/schemas/v2_0/SDMXMessage.xsd"
#> 
#> $Structure$Header
#> $Structure$Header$ID
#> [1] "9b0dbfe2-6176-43e2-a9db-cac88fcfbbbc"
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Test
#> [1] "false"
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Prepared
#> [1] "2023-11-08T13:45:31"
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Sender
#> $Structure$Header$Sender$`@id`
#> [1] "1C0"
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Sender$Name
#> $Structure$Header$Sender$Name$`@xml:lang`
#> [1] "en"
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Sender$Name$`#text`
#> [1] "IMF"
#> 
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Sender$Contact
#> $Structure$Header$Sender$Contact$URI
#> [1] "http://www.imf.org"
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Sender$Contact$Telephone
#> [1] "+ 1 (202) 623-6220"
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $Structure$Header$Receiver
#> $Structure$Header$Receiver$`@id`
#> [1] "ZZZ"
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $Structure$CodeLists
#> $Structure$CodeLists$CodeList
#>                       @id @agencyID @version @isFinal
#> 1            CL_UNIT_MULT       IMF      1.0     true
#> 2                 CL_FREQ       IMF      1.0     true
#> 3             CL_AREA_DOT       IMF      1.0     true
#> 4        CL_INDICATOR_DOT       IMF      1.0     true
#> 5 CL_COUNTERPART_AREA_DOT       IMF      1.0     true
#> 6          CL_TIME_FORMAT       IMF      1.0     true
#>                                                        @xmlns
#> 1 http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/structure
#> 2 http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/structure
#> 3 http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/structure
#> 4 http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/structure
#> 5 http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/structure
#> 6 http://www.SDMX.org/resources/SDMXML/schemas/v2_0/structure
#> #> 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        10/24/2023
#> 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Direction of Trade Statistics (DOTS)
#> 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Monthly and quarterly data are available starting 1960. Annual data are available starting 1947.
#> 4                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         DOTS covers all IMF member states, some non-member countries, the world, and major areas.
#> 5                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Guide to Direction of Trade Statistics, 1993. See Documents tab.
#> 6 The <B>Direction of Trade Statistics (DOTS)</B> presents the value of merchandise exports and imports disaggregated according to a country's primary trading partners. Area and world aggregates are included in the display of trade flows between major areas of the world. Reported data is supplemented by estimates whenever such data is not available or current. Imports are reported on a cost, insurance and freight (CIF) basis and exports are reported on a free on board (FOB) basis, with the exception of a few countries for which imports are also available FOB. Time series data includes estimates derived from reports of partner countries for non-reporting and slow-reporting countries.
#> 7                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               DOT
#>
